project_1_1: This website is designed for those nights when you and your friends feel like a cocktail but don't know what to drink.
project_1_2: The web will randomly generate a cocktail and will show you both the instructions to prepare it and the list of ingredients, as well as a photo of the cocktail.

project_2_2: It is designed to be played with your friends in the same house. Inside the website there is a guide on how to play the game.
